title: Lost 7 games at 0lp, No demotion.
body: So I went on a very big win streak, and went from Silver 5 to Silver 2 in about 2 days, and I tilted and lost 7 in a row at 0lp, I have not yet been demoted, but ive been demoted for 3 losses at 0lp in the past, why am I not getting demoted?

replies.body: You gain a loss shield whenever you earn your promotion.  The number of shields you get vary depending on tier or division, and more details on that can be found through our [ranked play](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) guide.  It's likely that another loss at this point could demote you, so give it your all!  Good luck!
